title: The Heart of Andros: Andros Island Book 1
description: Cultural anthropology graduate student, Adair Stafford, has the chance of a lifetime. After being selected to conduct a research study in the beauty of Andros island, she leaves behind her broken heart to pursue a lifelong goal.All is going as planned until Adair and her research partner find themselves transported back in time, thrown into the very culture they came to uncover.As Adair learns to adjust, she finds herself developing feelings for more than one complicated man while still trying to let go of the one who broke her heart.Is there a way back to the future and, in the end, will she want to go back after finding her heart in Andros?
author: Jade Oliver
